name: Protect The Pizza
description:
воспользуйтесь переводчиком Google, чтобы прочитать управление игрой, объяснение темы варенья и подробности установки на русском языке

Game Controls:

(a and d) to move left and right

(left click) to shoot where you click

(space) to jump

Description:

Play as an energetic chef who is willing to put his life on the line to protect the integrity of his pizzas from treacherous pineapples in this bilingual game (English and Russian). The game fits the game jam theme "combine incompatible" in two ways:

1. It is a game both about pizza and pineapples: two INCOMPATIBLE foods.

2. It combines cooking and fighting: two seemingly INCOMPATIBLE game genres.

The objective of the game is to make as many pizzas as possible. To make pizzas let tomatoes and cheese into the oven. Each piece of cheese is worth two pizzas and each tomato is worth one pizza. Be careful though! You can lose quickly in two ways. If 3 pineapples reach the oven the pizza integrity is compromised and it's game over (Shown With Gold Hearts). And if the chef is hit by the pineapples 3 times he dies and it's game over (Shown With Red Hearts). To stop the pineapples from hurting you or the oven you must shoot them with your blaster. Remember the blaster can hurt the tomatoes and cheese too so think about how you use it. Good luck!

(MADE BY BOSSYDUCK)
